title: Trundle buffed on PBE
body:

Decompose
Renamed King's Tribute.png King's Tribute

Rabid Bite
Renamed Chomp
Damage adjusted to 20 / 40 / 60 / 80 / 100 (+100 / 105 / 110 / 115 / 120% attack damage) from 30 / 45 / 60 / 75 / 90 (+80 / 90 / 100 / 110 / 120% attack damage).
Now slows target by 75% for 0.1 seconds on hit.
Animation speed scales with Trundle's attack speed.

Contaminate
Renamed Frozen Domain
Attack speed bonus increased to 20 / 35 / 50 / 65 / 80% from 20 / 30 / 40 / 50 / 60%.
Now grants 8 / 11 / 14 / 17 / 20% increased healing to Trundle.
No longer grants tenacity.

Pillar of Filth
Renamed Pillar of Ice
Now interrupts channels.
Duration reduced to 6 seconds from 6.5.

Agony
Renamed Subjugate
Initial damage and drain over time changed to 10 / 11 / 12 (+1 per 100 AP)% max health damage from 100 / 175 / 250 (+60% AP).
Initial armor and magic resist steal and drain over time adjusted to 20% from 15 / 20 / 25%.
Drain over time effect now applies over 4 seconds and keeps the stats for another 4 seconds afterwards instead of draining over 6 seconds.


From what I can tell from these patch notes, his cooldowns weren't changes.  In fact, Rabid Bite got a QoL buff that had been asked for for over a year, Contaminate got extra attack speed and healing at the cost of tenacity which is fair, Pillar of Filth allowed to interrupt channels (another QoL buff that people had asked for), and Agony was changed to be more meta that it previously was (in relation to what tanks built).  Then they took away his ability to use it on Dragon and Baron.  

They didn't really buff him at all in relation to taking that power away.
